languages.text: "Да! И я снова готова следовать за тобой. Как никогда раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Да! И я снова готова следовать за тобой. Как никогда раньше".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."
languages.original_text: "Да! И я снова готова следовать за тобой. Как никогда раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More ready than ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More ready than ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「まったくだ！そして我は再び陛下について行く準備ができています。これまで以上に」
languages.original_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."

traits.locale_text: 「まったくだ！そして我は再び陛下について行く準備ができています。これまで以上に」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “确实如此！我已经准备好追随你的脚步了，比以往任何时候都更想与你同行。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此！我已经准备好追随你的脚步了，比以往任何时候都更想与你同行。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire. Et plus que jamais, je suis prête à vous suivre où que vous alliez. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire. Et plus que jamais, je suis prête à vous suivre où que vous alliez. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Desde luego! Y estoy lista para seguirle. Más que nunca».
languages.original_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."

traits.locale_text: «¡Desde luego! Y estoy lista para seguirle. Más que nunca».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "In der Tat! Und ich bin bereit, Euch erneut zu folgen. Mehr denn je."
languages.original_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat! Und ich bin bereit, Euch erneut zu folgen. Mehr denn je."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kesinlikle! Bir kez daha peşinden gelmeye hazırım... Öncekinden bile daha çok hazırım."
languages.original_text: "Indeed! And I am ready to follow you again. More than ever."

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle! Bir kez daha peşinden gelmeye hazırım... Öncekinden bile daha çok hazırım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
